The third, , was completed as an aircraft carrier and the fourth was scrapped before completion.Garzke & Dulin, pp. 74â€“80, 84built for the Imperial Japanese Navy (IJN), beginning in the late 1930s. The Yamato-class ships were the heaviest and most powerfully armed battleships ever constructed, displacing almost fully loaded and armed with nine main guns. == References == Category:Warships
title: Japanese battleship Musashi
